title: Gunslinger

fields.name: Potshot:
fields.value: Publicly target a player during the Day. You will attempt to deal a 10.0x Attack Power Attack to them. The chance of hitting is (15% + (Your Last Evening Score - Their Last Evening Score)/2). This can be used once per Day.

fields.name: Behold, a Gun! (x1, Charge 150%, Locked):
fields.value: Unlocks when you place in the Top 3. Target a player. The next Day, they will be able to use one charge of Potshot.

fields.name: My Dying Wish (Passive):
fields.value: When you die, you may immediately grant a living player one charge of Potshot. This ability cannot be roleblocked.
